<small>Hebrew form: [[H7925]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכַב‎</span> ([[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 63</sup>) **verb** ==lie down== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שכב‎</span> [[Eccl.47.23|Eccl 47:23]] (in death), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משכב‎</span> ***bed*** [[Eccl.40.5|Eccl 40:5]], = ***death bed*** [[Eccl.46.19|Eccl 46:19]] Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שכב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משכב‎</span> (see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> 

**1.** below), [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>375</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***lie***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁכַב‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משכבא‎</span> ***couch***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> only ***pour out*** (water, tears), ***be poured out*** (compare **Hiph\`il** below, and [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 63</sup>)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.26.10|Gen 26:10]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁכַּב‎</span> [[Gen.30.15|Gen 30:15]] +, 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁכְּבֻן‎</span> [[1Sam.2.22|1Sam 2:22]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִשְׁכָּב֑וּן‎</span> [[Josh.2.8|Josh 2:8]]; [[Job.30.17|Job 30:17]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁכַב‎</span> [[2Sam.13.5|2Sam 13:5]]; [[Ezek.4.4|Ezek 4:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁכְבָה‎</span> [[Gen.39.7|Gen 39:7]]; [[Gen.39.12|Gen 39:12]], etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכֹב‎</span> [[Lev.15.24|Lev 15:24]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁכַב‎</span> [[1Kgs.1.21|1Kgs 1:21]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכְבוֺ‎</span> [[Ruth.3.4|Ruth 3:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁכְבָהּ‎</span> [[Gen.19.33|Gen 19:33]]; [[Gen.19.35|Gen 19:35]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכְבְּךָ‎</span> [[Deut.6.7|Deut 6:7]] + 2 t.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁכֵב‎</span> [[Gen.28.13|Gen 28:13]] +, feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁכֶ֫בֶת‎</span> [[Mic.7.5|Mic 7:5]]; [[Ruth.3.8|Ruth 3:8]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***lie down*** (sometimes opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵקִיץ‎</span>): 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** [[Judg.5.27|Judg 5:27]] (prostrated by blow, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּרַע‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָפַל‎</span>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** to sleep, [[Gen.19.4|Gen 19:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.28.11|Gen 28:11]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.3.5|1Sam 3:5]]; [[Deut.7.7|Deut 7:7]]; [[Prov.6.22|Prov 6:22]] + often; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁכַּב‎</span> also (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּשְׁכֵּם‎</span>) [[1Sam.9.26|1Sam 9:26]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and modern; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשֵׁן‎</span> ***sleep*** [[1Kgs.19.5|1Kgs 19:5]]; [[Ps.3.6|Ps 3:6]]; [[Ps.4.9|Ps 4:9]], compare [[Prov.3.24|Prov 3:24]] (twice in verse), + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִרְדָּם‎</span> [[Jonah.1.5|Jonah 1:5]] = ***be lying*** [[1Sam.3.2|1Sam 3:2]]; [[1Sam.3.3|1Sam 3:3]]; [[1Sam.26.5|1Sam 26:5]] (all <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> local), v[[1Sam.26.7|1Sam 26:7]]; [[1Sam.4.5|1Sam 4:5]] (accusative of congnate meaning with verb noon-repose), [[2Sam.13.8|2Sam 13:8]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁכֵב בְּלֶביָֿם‎</span> [[Prov.23.34|Prov 23:34]], of two lying (together, for warmth) [[Eccl.4.11|Eccl 4:11]] + be sleeping [[1Sam.26.7|1Sam 26:7]] = ***keep lying***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַד‎</span> [[Judg.16.3|Judg 16:3]]; [[1Sam.3.15|1Sam 3:15]]; [[Ruth.3.13|Ruth 3:13]]; [[Prov.6.9|Prov 6:9]] emphasis on ***resting***, [[Lev.26.6|Lev 26:6]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Job.11.18|Job 11:18]] token of mourning, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׁכַב אָ֑רְצָה‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלָן‎</span>) [[2Sam.12.16|2Sam 12:16]], compare [[2Sam.13.21|2Sam 13:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּשָּׂק‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.21.27|1Kgs 21:27]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין שְׁפַתָּ֑יִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Ps.68.14|Ps 68:14]] (of indolence?); figurative of prostration by disease [[Ps.41.9|Ps 41:9]] among foes [[Ps.57.5|Ps 57:5]] of humiliation [[Jer.3.25|Jer 3:25]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing: land [[Gen.28.13|Gen 28:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), usually bed [[2Sam.13.5|2Sam 13:5]]; [[1Kgs.21.4|1Kgs 21:4]]; [[Lev.15.4|Lev 15:4]]; [[Lev.15.24|Lev 15:24]]; [[Lev.15.26|Lev 15:26]], compare v[[Lev.15.20|Lev 15:20]], for midday repose [[2Sam.4.7|2Sam 4:7]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***lie*** on (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>) one's side [[Ezek.4.4|Ezek 4:4]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.4.6|Ezek 4:6]]; [[Ezek.4.9|Ezek 4:9]] (symbolic). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** ***lie***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[1Kgs.3.19|1Kgs 3:19]] (fatally), [[2Kgs.4.34|2Kgs 4:34]] (to revive). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** ***lie*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּחֵיק‎</span>, of lamb (i.e. be cherished) [[2Sam.12.3|2Sam 12:3]], of woman [[Mic.7.5|Mic 7:5]] (intimacy), [[1Kgs.1.2|1Kgs 1:2]] (vital warmth); ***lie down*** for copulation [[Gen.19.33|Gen 19:33]]; [[Gen.19.35|Gen 19:35]] (of woman, see 

**3.** below; both opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּם‎</span>). 

**2.** = ***lodge*** (for night), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(שָׁ֫מָּהׅ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Josh.2.1|Josh 2:1]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Kgs.4.11|2Kgs 4:11]], compare [[2Kgs.9.16|2Kgs 9:16]] (yet perhaps = ***lie ill***), [[Lev.14.47|Lev 14:47]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> local). 

**3.** of sexual relations, ***lie*** with: subject man, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> [[Gen.30.15|Gen 30:15]]; [[Gen.30.16|Gen 30:16]]; [[Gen.39.7|Gen 39:7]]; [[Gen.39.12|Gen 39:12]]; [[Gen.39.14|Gen 39:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.22.13|Exod 22:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.22.22|Deut 22:22]] + 8 t. Deuteronomy; [[2Sam.11.4|2Sam 11:4]]; [[2Sam.11.11|2Sam 11:11]]; [[2Sam.12.11|2Sam 12:11]]; [[2Sam.12.24|2Sam 12:24]]; [[Lev.15.33|Lev 15:33]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶת‎</span> feminine ***with*** ([[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹתָהּ‎</span>, etc., originally <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִתָּהּ‎</span>, etc., see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>[[2Sam.13.14|2Sam 13:14]] and II.</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span>, p. 85:a above), [[Gen.26.10|Gen 26:10]]; [[Gen.34.2|Gen 34:2]]; [[Gen.34.7|Gen 34:7]]; [[Gen.35.22|Gen 35:22]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.2.22|1Sam 2:22]] (omitted by [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] and modern), [[2Sam.13.14|2Sam 13:14]]; [[Ezek.23.8|Ezek 23:8]] (figurative), [[Lev.15.24|Lev 15:24]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכֹב יִשְׁכַּב‎</span>), [[Num.5.19|Num 5:19]], also (with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁכְבַתזֶֿרַע‎</span>) v[[Num.5.13|Num 5:13]]; [[Lev.15.18|Lev 15:18]]; [[Lev.19.20|Lev 19:20]] with accusative (suffix) feminine [[Deut.28.30|Deut 28:30]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁגֵל‎</span>]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵצֶל‎</span> feminine [[Gen.39.10|Gen 39:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> of a man (sodomy), [[Lev.18.22|Lev 18:22]]; [[Lev.20.13|Lev 20:13]] (both [[BDB#H|H]]; with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁכְּבֵי אִשָּׁה‎</span>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִםבְּֿהֵמָה‎</span> [[Deut.27.21|Deut 27:21]]; [[Lev.22.18|Lev 22:18]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); subject woman, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> of a man [[Gen.19.32|Gen 19:32]]; [[Gen.19.34|Gen 19:34]]; [[Gen.19.35|Gen 19:35]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[2Sam.13.11|2Sam 13:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> of a man [[Gen.19.33|Gen 19:33]]; [[Gen.19.34|Gen 19:34]] (compare **1 e** above). 

**4. a.** ***lie down*** in death, [[Isa.14.8|Isa 14:8]]; [[Isa.43.17|Isa 43:17]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּם‎</span>), [[Ezek.31.18|Ezek 31:18]]; [[Ezek.32.27|Ezek 32:27]]; [[Ezek.32.28|Ezek 32:28]]; [[Ezek.32.29|Ezek 32:29]]; [[Ezek.32.30|Ezek 32:30]]; [[Job.14.12|Job 14:12]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵקִיץ‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְאֶשְׁקוֺט‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Job.3.12|Job 3:12]] ***be lying*** (dead) [[Isa.51.20|Isa 51:20]]; [[Lam.2.21|Lam 2:21]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** especially in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם אֲבוֺתָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> ***lie down with his fathers***, of kings [[1Kgs.1.21|1Kgs 1:21]]; [[1Kgs.2.10|1Kgs 2:10]] + 35 t. Kings Chronicles, compare [[Gen.47.30|Gen 47:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Deut.31.16|Deut 31:16]], and (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span>) [[2Sam.7.12|2Sam 7:12]] 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** in grave, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּבֵיתוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.14.18|Isa 14:18]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקִּבְרְךָ‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁכְבֵי קֶבֶר‎</span> [[Ps.88.6|Ps 88:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶעָפָר‎</span> [[Job.7.21|Job 7:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלעֿ‎</span> [[Job.20.11|Job 20:11]]; [[Job.21.26|Job 21:26]] in <abbr title="transliteration"><u>sh®°ôl</u></abbr> [[Ezek.32.21|Ezek 32:21]] in Gehenna (?) [[Isa.50.11|Isa 50:11]]. 

**5.** figurative = relax: [[Job.30.17|Job 30:17]] ***my gnawing pains do not sleep***; = have rest, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבּוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא שׁ‎</span> [[Eccl.2.23|Eccl 2:23]]. **Niph\`al Pu\`al** = ***be lain with*** (sexually; subject woman), only as [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] for [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁגֵל‎</span>] **Niph\`al Pu\`al** q. v. **Hiph\`il** ***lay, Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁכִּיבָה‎</span> with accusative puer. + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּחֵיק‎</span> [[1Kgs.3.20|1Kgs 3:20]], so ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּשְׁכִּיבֵהוּ‎</span> v[[1Kgs.3.20|1Kgs 3:20]], compare (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלמִֿטָּה‎</span>) [[1Kgs.17.19|1Kgs 17:19]]; [[2Kgs.4.21|2Kgs 4:21]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁכֵּב אוֺתָם אַ֫רְצָה‎</span> [[2Sam.8.2|2Sam 8:2]] ***making them lie down on ground; Imperfect*** also ***lay*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּמִּשְׁכָּב‎</span> [[2Chr.16.14|2Chr 16:14]] (of burial); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִבְלֵי שָׁמַיִם מִי יַשְׁכִּיב‎</span> [[Job.38.37|Job 38:37]] i.e. tip them so that contents may flow out (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> above). **Hoph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֻשְׁכָּב‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.32|2Kgs 4:32]] ***laid*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלמִֿטָּה‎</span>; ***Perfect*** consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהֻשְׁכַּב‎</span> [[Ezek.32.32|Ezek 32:32]] ***shall be laid*** (in death), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּתוֺךְ‎</span> and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> person (***with***); so ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָשְׁכְּבָה‎</span> v[[Ezek.32.19|Ezek 32:19]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> person only). 



 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁכב‎</span> (√ of following; Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכַב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִשְׁכָּב‎</span>).
